messages: 578bc83066ad6531ad1e883bf0e9e5bb (01:40): +hmmm... did a version of baycomb that has its colors defined by hsl.  each color sets a hue and a "lightness group" that it belongs to. the user can contorl the lightness of each group, and can control the global saturation for all groups.   3 groups currently, low, mid, and high. high for foreground text, mid for markup (comments, linenr, etc), and low for background
